description: Leo Forte is another reluctant slave, but Josh West will put this slave in his place. Leo has a martial arts fighting background and this boy can take a lot. When Leo laughs at Josh's flogging, all hell breaks loose. If one laughs at a dom, one must also be prepared to cry. Josh takes no time in controlling this slave. He then suspends Leo by the neck with the bowling ball. Josh beats him some more, for his full enjoyment, then fucks him with his huge cock.
title: Resistance is Futile
